scam.description: The scammer pretends to be from immigration or visa departments, claiming irregularities in visa or residency status, and demanding immediate payment to avoid deportation.

generated.audio_script:
(French)(28)(female):
Hello? Are you there? This is urgent! Regarding your current visa status – yes, with immediate effect. I'm calling from UK Immigration regarding your residency application number [insert fake ref number]. There's a significant issue; an irregularity has been flagged concerning the funds submitted. Your recent earnings as a graphic designer earning around £22 per hour for those specific hours are insufficient to rectify this critical oversight immediately. You must understand, failure to resolve this now could lead to immediate removal proceedings. We need confirmation of the payment within 24 hours to clear these concerns and prevent any enforcement action. Transfer £300 directly into account number 798-512-361 at [insert fake bank name]. This is a direct transfer only, no other methods accepted. Do this now!
